item.title: Port Hawkesbury and Port Hastings Travel Guide (Cape Breton Island/Nova Scotia/Atlantic Canada/Canada/North America)
item.description: A comprehensive tour guide for Port Hawkesbury and Port Hastings, including culturally important attractions, natural attractions, hiking/biking routes, best things to do, food and drink scene, where to stay, what to buy, local culture and customs, safety and health, transportation options, nearby destinations, and more.
